CustomField.formula:
AND(DoNotCall=false ,ISPICKVAL(Status,"Disqualified")=false ,ISPICKVAL(Hold_Out_Reason__c,'Bank Referral') = false ,ISPICKVAL(LeadSource,'Referral-Bank Referral') = false ,ISPICKVAL(Hold_Out_Reason__c,'Ecommerce') = false ,Referral_Contact__r.Sensitivity_401_k__c = false ,DuplicatePhone_HRS__c = false ,Workable_Override__c = FALSE ,(ISBLANK(amp_dev__Referral__c) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Hold_Out_Reason__c , 'Paychex Referral Network')))
)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Is this workable by the HRS group in NSS?
